setting.primary_location: Green Bank Observatory (West Virginia), various quarantine facilities, underground bunkers, and the protagonist's deteriorating perception of reality
setting.atmosphere: Creeping dread and geometric wrongness. Reality becomes increasingly unstable. Liminal spaces. The mundane made horrifying. Sensory distortion and synesthesia.
setting.technology_level: Contemporary with slight advancement - VR therapy common, neural monitoring exists, AI companions widespread

the_change.transmission_vector: Exposure to Voyager 2's altered signals causes neurological changes
progression_stages: Stage 1: Geometric dreams, pattern recognition enhancement
Stage 3: Erosion of human emotional responses, understanding incomprehensible truths
Stage 4: Transcendence into posthuman state - consciousness untethered from linear time
the_change.irreversibility: No cure exists - progression can be slowed but not stopped
the_change.infectiousness: Not contagious person-to-person, only through signal exposure

voyager_transformation.nature: Probe passed through a region where space-time is 'thin' - intersects with higher dimensional space
voyager_transformation.not_alien: No aliens in traditional sense - Voyager encountered fundamental reality beyond human perception
voyager_transformation.return_mechanism: Being 'drawn' back to Earth like iron to magnet - the thin region is expanding, Earth is next
voyager_transformation.probe_state: Part spacecraft, part doorway, part incomprehensible structure that human eyes can't properly parse

reality_degradation.the_changed_see_truth: Affected individuals perceive reality's underlying mathematical structure
reality_degradation.observer_effect: As more people Change, local reality becomes less stable
reality_degradation.geometry_matters: Certain shapes and angles cause pain/euphoria to the Changed - architecture becomes hostile/welcoming
reality_degradation.consensus_reality_breaking: Book 3 - reality itself fractures as Changed population reaches critical mass

government_response.quarantine_protocol: Changed individuals detained in special facilities
government_response.study_vs_destroy: Debate between scientists who want to study and military who want to eliminate
government_response.information_suppression: Signals are classified, but data has leaked
government_response.the_changed_network: Stage 3+ Changed can perceive each other - form gestalt consciousness

cosmic_horror_rules.incomprehensibility: Ultimate truth cannot be fully understood by human minds - attempting to causes breakdown
cosmic_horror_rules.scale_horror: The entity/force beyond is not malicious - it simply IS, and human concerns are meaningless at that scale
cosmic_horror_rules.no_heroes: Cannot be fought or negotiated with - only choices are accept transformation or die human
cosmic_horror_rules.beauty_in_terror: Transformation is described as both horrifying loss and transcendent gain

themes: The Terror of Transcendence - What if evolution is indistinguishable from infection?
Loss of Humanity - At what point does transformation make you no longer yourself?
Meaning in a Meaningless Universe - If consciousness is just pattern recognition, what matters?
tone: Atmospheric and unsettling. Heavy use of sensory distortion. Unreliable narrator elements as protagonist Changes. Clinical horror - medical descriptions of transformation. Moments of terrible beauty. Creeping inevitability. No jump scares, only existential dread.
